Package Restaurant_package

Class Restaurant

  • java.lang.Object
    • Restaurant_package.Restaurant
  • public class Restaurant
extends java.lang.Object
    Restaurant class that stores all reservation information at all timeslots and tables

      Restaurant()

      static boolean checkTimeslotFullyBooked​(int time)
      Checks if a specific timeslot has been fully booked across all tables in this Restaurant

      Initialises all Table objects in restaurant, sets all tables and timeslots to be empty

      Gets Array of Table objects in this Restaurant

    • Method Detail

      • createTables

        public static void createTables()
        Initialises all Table objects in restaurant, sets all tables and timeslots to be empty

      • getTables

        public static Table[] getTables()
        Gets Array of Table objects in this Restaurant
        Returns:
        Table[] of size 10, indexes correspond to (table Id - 1)

      • getTimeSlots

        public static java.lang.String[] getTimeSlots()
        Gets Array of Strings of fixed timeslots in this Restaurant, opening at 10:00 and closing at 22:00
        Returns:
        String[] of size 6, each string has format "XX:00 - YY:00" where XX and YY represent hours in a day and are 2 hours apart

      • printTimeSlots

        public static void printTimeSlots()
        Displays the timeslots this restaurant offers

      • checkTimeslotFullyBooked

        public static boolean checkTimeslotFullyBooked​(int time)
        Checks if a specific timeslot has been fully booked across all tables in this Restaurant
        Parameters:
        time - int index of timeslot to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean true if all tables are reserved at that time, else false

      • printTableAvailabilityByTime

        public static void printTableAvailabilityByTime​(int time)
        Displays table availability across all tables for a specific timeslot
        Parameters:
        time - int index of timeslot to be checked

      • printTableAvailabilityByTable

        public static void printTableAvailabilityByTable​(int table)
        Displays table availability across all timeslots for a specific table
        Parameters:
        table - int ID of Table to be checked

      • printTableAvailabilityAll

        public static void printTableAvailabilityAll()
